title: Create a Video Ad Storyboard
description: A creative director needs to create a storyboard for a 30-second video ad.

tasks.description: Outline the key scenes for the video ad (e.g., Scene 1: Problem, Scene 2: Solution, Scene 3: CTA).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a high-level narrative arc.

tasks.description: For each scene, write a brief description of the visuals and any accompanying on-screen text or voiceover.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent details the content of each scene.

tasks.description: Select stock imagery or create rough sketches to represent the visuals for each scene.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a complete visual and written storyboard ready for production.
